## genPassPhraseNormal

[src/functions.js:28-30][5]

This function adds one to its input.

### Parameters

*   `length` &#x20;
*   `words` &#x20;
*   `separator`   (optional, default `defaultSeparator`)
*   `input` **[number][6]** any number

Returns **[number][6]** that number, plus one.
